page.title: 17OLD HEMEL HIGH STREET
page.content: On the{High Street}there are {specialist shops}like house of fishes, art shop, pine furniture, local quality butcher, florist and handicrafts. There are also{services like the Help Organisation, solicitors and Business Management Training Centre. Several{restaurants}and{pubs are to be found. The{houses}and{shops}on the High Street are built in a picturesque style and present a well cared for image. There is a{Norman Church,}St. Mary's, with a famous spire which is being restored. There are several attractive 16th, 17th and 18th century buildings and a{Town Hall}with a covered market. This is only used by private individuals and charities on Saturdays now. The Town Hall itself is used as a leisure centre.
